title: Abi-Dalzim’s Horrid Wilting
desc:
Post 932
- You draw the moisture from every creature in a 30-foot cube. **<:blue:1106234079055200378> is replaced with <:black:1106265022453268530>.**
- Everyone else draws a <:blue:1106234079055200378> card from the lack of moisture.
- You lose a **Spell Slot.**
